Form.title: Form
Form.description: A form artifact that defines a data contract with field definitions, optional layers for rendering, and optional annexes. Forms are the primary artifact type for structured data collection and document generation.

allOf.title: Artifact
allOf.description: Root schema for all OpenForm artifacts (containers and documents).

$schema.description: JSON Schema URI for this artifact instance.

name.description: Unique artifact identifier. Must start with a letter or digit, can contain letters, numbers, and hyphens (no leading/trailing/consecutive hyphens).

version.description: Artifact version (semantic versioning). Required for publishing to registry.

title.description: Human-readable title. Recommended for published/shared artifacts and directory browsing.

description.description: Detailed description or context for the artifact.

fields.description: Form field definitions keyed by field identifier. Fields define the input structure and validation rules for the form

layers.description: Named layers for rendering this form into different formats. Keys are user-defined identifiers (e.g., markdown, pdf, html)

defaultLayer.description: Key of the default layer to use when none specified at render time

allowAdditionalAnnexes.description: Whether additional ad-hoc annexes can be attached beyond those defined in the annexes record

annexes.description: Predefined annex slots keyed by identifier. Each slot can be marked as required (must be filled at runtime) or optional

parties.description: Party role definitions keyed by role identifier. Each role specifies constraints on who can fill it (person/organization) and signature requirements.

FormField.title: FormField
FormField.description: Single input/data element. Fields are keyed by their identifier and can be of various types (text, number, boolean, address, phone, etc.) or nested fieldsets

description.description: Description or help text for the field
Description or help text for the field
Description or help text for the field
Description or help text for the field
Description or help text for the field
Description or help text for the field
Description or help text for the field
Description or help text for the field
Description or help text for the field
Description or help text for the field
Description or help text for the field
Description or help text for the field
Description or help text for the field

enum.description: Array of allowed values for the enum field

description.description: Description or help text for the field
Description or help text for the field
Description or help text for the field
Description or help text for the field
Description or help text for the field
Description or help text for the field
Description or help text for the field
Description or help text for the field
Description or help text for the field

step.description: Increment step (e.g., 0.5 for half stars, default: 1)

FormAnnex.title: FormAnnex
FormAnnex.description: Defines an annex slot where a document must or may be attached at runtime

title.description: Title or heading for the annex slot

description.description: Description of what document should be attached

FormParty.title: FormParty
FormParty.description: Design-time party role definition. Defines what roles exist and what constraints apply when filling a form.

description.description: Description of this role

signature.title: FormSignature
signature.description: Design-time signature requirements for a party role

required.description: Whether signature is required for this role

witnesses.description: Number of witnesses required for this signature

notarized.description: Whether at least one witness must be a notary

FormFieldset.title: FormFieldset
FormFieldset.description: Grouped collection of fields that can be nested. Fields are keyed by their identifier

id.description: Unique identifier for the fieldset (e.g., address-section, personal-info)

title.description: Title or heading for the fieldset

description.description: Description or summary of the fieldset

Document.title: Document
Document.description: A document artifact representing static content with no inputs. Documents can have multiple layers for rendering to different output formats (e.g., PDF, Markdown, HTML).

allOf.title: Artifact
allOf.description: Root schema for all OpenForm artifacts (containers and documents).

$schema.description: JSON Schema URI for this artifact instance.

name.description: Unique artifact identifier. Must start with a letter or digit, can contain letters, numbers, and hyphens (no leading/trailing/consecutive hyphens).

version.description: Artifact version (semantic versioning). Required for publishing to registry.

title.description: Human-readable title. Recommended for published/shared artifacts and directory browsing.

description.description: Detailed description or context for the artifact.

layers.description: Named layers for rendering this document into different formats. Keys are user-defined identifiers (e.g., markdown, pdf, html)

defaultLayer.description: Key of the default layer to use when none specified at render time

Bundle.title: Bundle
Bundle.description: A bundle artifact that groups together related artifacts into a single distributable unit. Bundles can contain documents, forms, checklists, and other bundles.

allOf.title: Artifact
allOf.description: Root schema for all OpenForm artifacts (containers and documents).

$schema.description: JSON Schema URI for this artifact instance.

name.description: Unique artifact identifier. Must start with a letter or digit, can contain letters, numbers, and hyphens (no leading/trailing/consecutive hyphens).

version.description: Artifact version (semantic versioning). Required for publishing to registry.

title.description: Human-readable title. Recommended for published/shared artifacts and directory browsing.

description.description: Detailed description or context for the artifact.

contents.description: Ordered bundle contents. Each item has a key and is either an inline artifact, path reference, or registry reference.

items.description: Bundle content item: an inline artifact, path reference, or registry reference with optional include condition

key.description: Unique identifier for this content item, used to reference it in logic expressions

artifact.description: Inline artifact definition (document, form, checklist, or nested bundle)

key.description: Unique identifier for this content item, used to reference it in logic expressions

path.description: Absolute path from repo root to the artifact file

key.description: Unique identifier for this content item, used to reference it in logic expressions

BundleContentItem.description: Bundle content item: an inline artifact, path reference, or registry reference with optional include condition

key.description: Unique identifier for this content item, used to reference it in logic expressions

artifact.description: Inline artifact definition (document, form, checklist, or nested bundle)

key.description: Unique identifier for this content item, used to reference it in logic expressions

path.description: Absolute path from repo root to the artifact file

key.description: Unique identifier for this content item, used to reference it in logic expressions

Checklist.title: Checklist
Checklist.description: A checklist artifact containing an ordered list of items to track. Each item may define how its status should be represented at runtime (boolean or enum).

allOf.title: Artifact
allOf.description: Root schema for all OpenForm artifacts (containers and documents).

$schema.description: JSON Schema URI for this artifact instance.

name.description: Unique artifact identifier. Must start with a letter or digit, can contain letters, numbers, and hyphens (no leading/trailing/consecutive hyphens).

version.description: Artifact version (semantic versioning). Required for publishing to registry.

title.description: Human-readable title. Recommended for published/shared artifacts and directory browsing.

description.description: Detailed description or context for the artifact.

items.description: Array of checklist items. Each item represents a task, step, or requirement.

layers.description: Named layers for rendering this checklist into different formats. Keys are user-defined identifiers (e.g., markdown, pdf, html)

defaultLayer.description: Key of the default layer to use when none specified at render time

ChecklistItem.title: ChecklistItem
ChecklistItem.description: A single item in a checklist artifact. Each item has an ID, title, optional description, and an optional status specification (boolean or enum). If status is omitted, a default boolean status may be assumed (implementation-defined).

id.description: Unique identifier for the checklist item (e.g., "task-1", "step-a"). Used to link to runtime status.

title.description: Title or label for the checklist item

description.description: Detailed description or instructions for the item

status.title: StatusSpec
status.description: Specification for how checklist item status should be represented (boolean or enum).

anyOf.title: BooleanStatusSpec
anyOf.description: Boolean status (e.g., incomplete/complete) with an optional default value.

default.description: Default status value (true/false) for new instances

anyOf.title: EnumStatusSpec
anyOf.description: Enum-based status with a set of allowed options and an optional default.

label.description: Human-readable label for the status option

description.description: Optional description or help text for this status option

default.description: Default status value for new instances (must match one of the option values)

CondExpr.title: CondExpr
CondExpr.description: Conditional expression: boolean literal or expression string

anyOf.description: Expression string - either inline expression or reference to a logic key

LogicSection.title: LogicSection
LogicSection.description: Named computed values with type information that can be referenced in conditional expressions

^[a-zA-Z][a-zA-Z0-9_]*$.title: LogicExpression
^[a-zA-Z][a-zA-Z0-9_]*$.description: A typed computed value with optional metadata (label, description). The type property determines the expected result type and value schema.

label.description: Display label for the computed value

description.description: Description or documentation of the computed value

value.description: Expression that evaluates to a boolean

label.description: Display label for the computed value

description.description: Description or documentation of the computed value

value.description: Expression that evaluates to a string

label.description: Display label for the computed value

description.description: Description or documentation of the computed value

value.description: Expression that evaluates to a number

label.description: Display label for the computed value

description.description: Description or documentation of the computed value

value.description: Expression that evaluates to an integer

label.description: Display label for the computed value

description.description: Description or documentation of the computed value

value.description: Expression that evaluates to a percentage (0-100)

label.description: Display label for the computed value

description.description: Description or documentation of the computed value

value.description: Expression that evaluates to a rating value

label.description: Display label for the computed value

description.description: Description or documentation of the computed value

value.description: Expression that evaluates to an ISO 8601 date (YYYY-MM-DD)

label.description: Display label for the computed value

description.description: Description or documentation of the computed value

value.description: Expression that evaluates to a time (HH:MM:SS)

label.description: Display label for the computed value

description.description: Description or documentation of the computed value

value.description: Expression that evaluates to an ISO 8601 datetime

label.description: Display label for the computed value

description.description: Description or documentation of the computed value

value.description: Expression that evaluates to an ISO 8601 duration string

label.description: Display label for the computed value

description.description: Description or documentation of the computed value

value.description: Money object with amount and currency expressions

label.description: Display label for the computed value

description.description: Description or documentation of the computed value

label.description: Display label for the computed value

description.description: Description or documentation of the computed value

value.description: Phone object with number and optional type/extension expressions

label.description: Display label for the computed value

description.description: Description or documentation of the computed value

value.description: Coordinate object with latitude and longitude expressions

label.description: Display label for the computed value

description.description: Description or documentation of the computed value

value.description: Bounding box with north, south, east, west boundary expressions

label.description: Display label for the computed value

description.description: Description or documentation of the computed value

value.description: Person object with name component expressions

description.description: Description or documentation of the computed value

label.description: Display label for the computed value

description.description: Description or documentation of the computed value

value.description: Identification object with type, number, and optional issuer/date expressions

Layer.title: Layer
Layer.description: Layer specification  inline content or file reference

mimeType.description: MIME type of the layer content (e.g., text/markdown, application/pdf)

description.description: Description of what this layer represents

bindings.description: Mapping from form field names to template target identifiers

mimeType.description: MIME type of the layer content (e.g., text/markdown, application/pdf)

description.description: Description of what this layer represents

bindings.description: Mapping from form field names to template target identifiers

path.description: Absolute path from repo root to the layer file

Address.title: Address
Address.description: Physical address with street, locality, region, postal code, and country

country.description: ISO 3166-1 country code (e.g., "US", "GB", "FRA") or full country name

Bbox.title: Bbox
Bbox.description: Geographic bounding box defined by southwest (minimum) and northeast (maximum) corner coordinates

southWest.description: Southwest corner coordinate (minimum latitude and longitude)

northEast.description: Northeast corner coordinate (maximum latitude and longitude)

Coordinate.title: Coordinate
Coordinate.description: Geographic coordinate (WGS84) with latitude and longitude in decimal degrees

lat.description: Latitude in decimal degrees (WGS84), range -90 (South Pole) to 90 (North Pole)

lon.description: Longitude in decimal degrees (WGS84), range -180 (west) to 180 (east)

Duration.title: Duration
Duration.description: ISO 8601 duration string representing a time period. Format: P[n]Y[n]M[n]DT[n]H[n]M[n]S where P indicates period, T separates date and time components. Examples: P1Y (1 year), P3M (3 months), P1DT12H (1 day 12 hours), PT30M (30 minutes), PT5S (5 seconds)

Identification.title: Identification
Identification.description: Identification document with type, number, issuer, and optional issue and expiry dates

type.description: Type of identification document (e.g., ssn, passport, license, ein)

issuer.description: Issuing authority, country, or state (e.g., US, CA, DMV)

Money.title: Money
Money.description: Monetary value with currency code. Represents an amount in a specific currency, supporting both positive and negative values

amount.description: Monetary amount in the smallest currency unit (e.g., cents for USD) or as a decimal (e.g., 99.99 for USD). Negative values allowed for debts/credits

currency.description: ISO 4217 alpha-3 currency code (e.g., USD, EUR, GBP)

Metadata.title: Metadata
Metadata.description: Custom key-value pairs for storing domain-specific or organizational metadata. Keys must be alphanumeric with hyphens, values can be strings, numbers, booleans, or null

anyOf.description: Metadata value as a string (max 500 characters)

Organization.title: Organization
Organization.description: Organization with legal details and identification

legalName.description: Legal or registered name of the organization

entityType.description: Legal entity type of the organization

Person.title: Person
Person.description: Person with full name (required) and optional name components (title, first name, middle name, last name, suffix)

fullName.description: Person's full name (complete name as a single string)

title.description: Name prefix or title (e.g., Mr., Mrs., Dr., Prof.)

suffix.description: Name suffix (e.g., Jr., Sr., III, Esq.)

Phone.title: Phone
Phone.description: Phone number in E.164 international format with optional type and extension

number.description: Phone number in E.164 international format (e.g., +14155552671)

type.description: Type or category of phone number (e.g., mobile, work, home)

Attachment.title: Attachment
Attachment.description: Attachment data representing an attached document. The key in the record is the annex identifier (the key from form.annexes).

mimeType.description: MIME type of the attached file

Signature.title: Signature
Signature.description: Captured signature data containing the signature image, timestamp, capture method, and optional metadata.

image.description: Base64-encoded signature image or data URI

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 date-time when the signature was captured

method.description: Method used to capture the signature

type.description: Whether this is a full signature or initials

metadata.description: Additional metadata (IP address, device info, etc.)

OpenForm.title: OpenForm
OpenForm.description: Root schema for any OpenForm artifact document
